'''Radiant Spincrystal 104''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Ann's Quiescent Residence]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in the northern point of [[Annapausis]], [[Court of Fontaine Region]], [[Fontaine]]. Obtaining it requires progressing through the {{Quest|Ann of the Narzissenkreuz}}.
